page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: THE AREA COVERED BY THE GRID COMPRISES PARTS OF THE VILLAGES OF NORTH WHEATLEY AND HAYTON.THESE ARE SITUATED IN NORTH NOTTINGHAMSHIRE CLOSE TO THE TOWNS OF RETFORD AND GAINSBOROUGH.THE RIVER TRENT IS SITUATED SOME FIVE MILES AWAY.THE AREA IS MAINLY DEVOTED TO FARMING ALTHOUGH THE POWER STATIONS OF THE TRENT VALLEY DO OFFER EMPLOYMENT.THE NEAREST OF THESE POWER STATIONS IS WEST BURTON SOME TWO TO THREE MILES FROM THE EASTERN EDGE OF THE GRID. ALTHOUGH RETFORD AND GAINSBOROUGH ARE THE NEAREST TOWNS,THE LARGER SHOPPING AREAS ARE TO BE FOUND IN DONCASTER-19 MILES AWAY AND LINCOLN-22 MILES.
